metadata.title: CVE-2020-24294 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in psdParser::UnpackRLE function inPSDParser.cpp in FreeImage 3.19.0 [r1859] allows remote attackers to cuasea denial of service via opening of crafted psd file.

criterions.comment: freeimage: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
